page.title: 15A Prison Officer
page.content: At Highpoint Prison,officers perform many different duties,such as patrolling the very high double fence,taking charge of a Wing of the prison,radio officers,kitchen officers and such specialists as P.E. and education officers. An officer works shifts but has to do a lot of overtime which is well paid.He has to carry an identity card and a truncheon at all times.The prisoners have to be counted as they move from place to place,and locked up at night,but as this is a category 'C'prison they do not need to be locked up all the time. Some of the officers live at the prison in the former quarters of R.A.F.Stradishall.They have a Social Club and a sports ground there.
